name: io.github.joesaby/treenav-mcp
description: BM25 search + tree navigation over markdown docs for AI agents. No embeddings, no LLM calls.

environmentVariables.name: DOCS_ROOT
environmentVariables.description: Path to your markdown repository root

environmentVariables.name: DOCS_GLOB
environmentVariables.description: Glob pattern for finding markdown files (default: **/*.md)

environmentVariables.name: GLOSSARY_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to glossary.json for query expansion (default: $DOCS_ROOT/glossary.json)
